for storing excess net flow of pumped water providing a third vertically aligned compartment or tubing within or beside the housing wherein the third compartment has a first opening on an upper end and a second opening on a lower end wherein the upper end of the third compartment is in fluid communication with the first and second compartments providing a fourth compartment within the housing power source via a coupling.
